subject: Career
title: Giving Feedback That Actually Helps
description: Learn Giving Feedback That Actually Helps in one minute.

hook.text: 'Good job' is useless feedback. 'Your analysis was thorough and the executive summary saved us an hour' â€” that helps.

buildup.text: Effective feedback is specific, timely, actionable, and focused on behavior rather than character.

discovery.text: The SBI model: Situation (when/where), Behavior (what happened), Impact (what resulted). Clean and clear.

twist.text: Kim Scott's 'Radical Candor': caring personally while challenging directly. Not nice. Not mean. Honest.

climax.text: 'In yesterday's presentation (S), you skipped the financial slide (B), which left the CFO confused (I).'

punchline.text: Feedback without specifics is just an opinion.

quiz.question: What is the SBI feedback model?
